comment_text: There's another TI processor that never really took off despite its usage in arcade consoles at the time. The TMS340 http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/TMS34010) series. 32bit in 1987. I assume it was just out of the price range of 8bit and 16bit machines. It was used in Mortal Kombat and NBA Jam games I believe.
author: aninteger
story_title: The Texas Instruments TMX 1795: the first, forgotten microprocessor
